Negative_Review: Dismal room with no windows No staff on the bar Reception staff unhelpful Hotel not welcoming Poor value for money Never rate as a 4x hotel stayed in much better 3
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Getting the rooms ready earlier since most are coming in after a long overnight flight
Positive_Review: Location I have stayed at the property 3 times now Came with 2 groups prior to the last stay

Negative_Review: Rooms are not clean and some parts are very old Guess we got one of the older rooms Reception just average and it looked like they had no interest to welcome there guests
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: As above
Positive_Review: Was told that we were being given quiet area at back of hotel There was building work going on from early hours of the morning and into the evening which I know was not hotels fault but annoying still Also one night we decided to dine in the restaurant waited for 15 minutes and couldn t see anyone serving then went down to ask if restaurant was open went back to restaurant again still nobody came so left the hotel and eat somewhere else

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location but pricey Great breakfast Could get noisy at night since it s right on La Rambla But if you want access to all the action that s the place to be

Negative_Review: The room was dark it had no natural light and the window looked out onto a big fire escape which dominated the window there were always pidgeons on it cooing away and also two bedroom windows looked into the room adjacent
Positive_Review: The location was amazing

Negative_Review: When i checked out i left my stuff in the room for them to keep it in storage They took my suitcase without other stuff there was another shopping bag that had items when i called the hotel they were not helpful asking me to call again 5 times and nothing happened So my stuff was stolen
Positive_Review: Location and facility

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and professional Many were able to communicate in English which was helpful when we needed advice I loved the rooftop balcony where you can sit and watch the excitement on La Rambla below

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and lovely hotel We took 29 staff members there on a surprise trip and all the staff from back end booking to check out were extremely helpful and accommodating With such a large group we all had different classes of room and even the smallest ones were well kept very clean and extremely comfortable Sitting on the roof terrace in the sunshine was a definite highlight to waiting for the rest of the staff to arrive

Negative_Review: Euro style beds two doubles pushed together but you get used to it so it s not a big deal at all and very common in Europe
Positive_Review: The suite room 319 with the small balcony overlooking La Rambla was great Large room and you could always see everything happening below The rooftop terrace was also wonderful My wife and I purchased food from La Boqueria and had ourselves a wonderful tapas dinner overlooking the city one evening a must

Negative_Review: Staff was rude Website said their was a Jacuzzi and sauna but said nothing about the fact that you must pay extra too use those I ve never heard of a hotel that charges to use amenities There were several problems with my room including a sewage drainage issue after using the bathtub and a door came off the hinges But the worst part was not those things but that when I went to ask for a discount on the room due to those things the staff started arguing with me and being rude about the fact that I asked for a discount
Positive_Review: Really nice hotel and close to great sight seeing and activities

Negative_Review: The rooms were small the staff on the interior asked for 2 extra towels at night because they always put only 2 and just did not want to bring us We asked to change to the rooms for more at a large additional cost and they told us that there was no room in the hotel and from our room in the hotel we saw full rooms
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: This is an excellent hotel we were lucky to get booked in at the last minute we had had a disappointing experience with the previous booking at another location Our experience at this hotel thoroughly made up for the problems we had experienced Although this hotel cost a little more than we are used to paying It was a revelation to see what could be done The size of the rooms the decor and the facilities were absolutely superb The staff were polite pleasant and helpful A really great experience

Negative_Review: One of the dirtiest hotels I ve ever visited There was a blood stain on the comforter and hotel staff acted if this thing was normal
Positive_Review: Location is really nice on the Ramblas

Negative_Review: Having to step in and out of such a high bath to have a shower Very uncomfortable with this concept
Positive_Review: Great location on La Rambla and close to everything Easy to walk around

Negative_Review: Bed was on the hard side No milk in bedroom to go with our tea powdered or uht Small points really
Positive_Review: The hotel is on Rambla Street which is the centre of everything Very close to the Gothic section of Barcelona Short walk to Harbour Short walk to restaurants Short walk to sightseeing bus trips Couldn t go wrong

Negative_Review: The air conditioning was not turned on room got a bit hot and stuffy so had to open window wide which was not as good
Positive_Review: Nice large quiet room with a wall opposite the cost of quiet but did have a mural on it Kettle tea and coffee plus bottled water provided

Negative_Review: The lighting in the room and there was only the mirror in the bathroom I would have liked one in the bedroom avoid queuing
Positive_Review: Location was perfect staff very friendly particularly Amelia

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel on the Las Ramblas Beautiful room which we were upgraded to the piano suite Amazing to do this for us and the staff made us feel very welcome Location is brilliant for take a stroll in central Barca

Negative_Review: At times could be noisy from the street at night
Positive_Review: Breakfast was lovely Huge selection presented well Location very handy staff very friendly

Negative_Review: The rude staff at check in Our room wasn t cleaned the same way each day We didn t get our coffee or water which is complimentary until the THIRD day
Positive_Review: The location is perfect but would rather stay somewhere else

Negative_Review: The place is a bit dated The checkin experience was met with a bit of arrogance but I write that off to communication barriers I queried the fact that that breakfast was included I did so politely and felt that I was proven wrong with a waiter that made a bigger deal of the fact that it wasn t than was necessary I checked my paperwork again and told the waiter it was fine and my misunderstanding of the booking he then brings me the phone to the table where I was once again reminded by reception that I was wrong Completely unnecessary and quite condescending from the staff Just didn t like the attitude
Positive_Review: It was an OK hotel in a very good location If you want to stay somewhere in the middle of the action then this is the place to be At the beginning of La Rambla Just a short walk from the bus stops The hotel is not horrible I personally think the room we stayed in could do with a bit of updating compared to the price we paid In this case it seems that you pay for location

Negative_Review: The room window was facing the hotel dining entrance which was full with noise that wrnt all to way in to my room Every little noise of the guest in the hotel was getting right into my room Very hard to get quiet wake ups in the mornings great stuff
Positive_Review: Location was great

Negative_Review: Strange smell in the bathroom It s a bit cold during night but there s no heating in the room The air conditioner only has cold function
Positive_Review: Location Staffs are very friendly

Negative_Review: Bathrooms old and grubby in need of replacement View from window was of a brick wall immediately in front Have stayed at several other 4 stars in central Barcelona which were better
Positive_Review: Staff were all helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Cleanliness was poor bathroom had mould all along the shower seals and the door was warped showing evidence of a precious flood The escutcheon on the handle was missing too Would expect much higher standards in a four star hotel
Positive_Review: Location was perfect

Negative_Review: The staff did not have a good level of English Rooms were very smelly Not good facilities
Positive_Review: I did not like this hotel It was not what it was described in the booking Rooms were not clean The rooms were so smelly smell of toilet it seemed they did not have a proper ventilation

Negative_Review: In our room 101 we could hear the rumble of the underground subway The front window would not seal shut properly so street noise was louder than it should ve been But we were so exhausted after sightseeing it didn t effect our ability to sleep Bring ear plugs and eye shades and you ll be fine The room could ve used a fresh coat of paint And we would ve liked to have had lotion offered as a part of the bathroom amenities
Positive_Review: The room size was good The bed was comfortable In the lobby they offered complementary fruit infused water The location was excellent It was very easy to get to and from the airport using the Aerobus Concert venues were nearby There was a Starbucks and a huge Carrefour grocery store across the street Everything we wanted and needed was right there

Negative_Review: The 4 star rating ive stayed in 2 stars much better than this hotel Constant smell of damp walls in the room have water marks the shower needs a jet wash clean and overall make over They have low lighting to try and hide how dirty the hotel is o
Positive_Review: Reception staff and porters are 5 star rating they cannot do enough for you Location is fab

Negative_Review: Room furniture was not even bare minimum and toilets were bad in drainage Very noisy corridors Will never come again as it was a bad decision I could have easily selected a better property in the same area in the amount I paid
Positive_Review: Only good thing was the location being in La Ramblas

Negative_Review: The bed could use an upgrade
Positive_Review: Location is right in the middle of everything The staff is very helpful and pleasant The breakfast well worth the price

Negative_Review: A bit noisy but no problem if you re only staying for 2 nights
Positive_Review: The staff were so friendly and helpful They couldn t do enough Hotel spotlessly clean and beds were very comfy

Negative_Review: The electricity is an issue
Positive_Review: Petty quiet except you hear other doors close in the halls Electricity went out occasionally and new staff didn t know where a mailbox was and we found it on the curb 5 feet away Good room and location just watch your pockets and put your passport in the safe

Negative_Review: The additional breakfast is very overpriced so I never did it Very loud at night since you re right on the main street and the rooms are not sound proofed You have to keep the windows open because you can t control the air conditioner so it gets warm
Positive_Review: Beds very comfortable location is perfect right in the middle of rambla well connected to everything

Negative_Review: Staff are so rude and unprofessional I asked for a tea spoon in my room the first answer I got is we will charge you for it sir When I first entered I have been given a room that was already occupied thanks God the occupants where out Bed is not confortable I booked a King size bed I end up having two single beds joined
Positive_Review: You can not find a better location

Negative_Review: As far as we were concerned there wasn t anything not to like
Positive_Review: The Hotel restaurant was perfect Wonderful food great choice and perfect service and fantastic value for money Would definitely recommend to anyone

Negative_Review: If I had to choose one thing it would be to make the dining room a little cosier different lighting seating but the food was lovely
Positive_Review: Fantastic location close to everything the city had to offer Very comfortable room with great bathroom facilities

Negative_Review: Accused of having not paid even when showed the booking confirmation and bank statement Foul smell in the room NO AIR CONDITIONING even though it clearly says that THEY DO HAVE IT the room was 26 degrees CELCIUS im from Scotland so as you can probably guess it was unbareable to sleep at night and I was reduced to sleeping on the floor as it was the coldest part of the room and they refused to change us rooms On top of that there was no windows to open only a door with a glass pane behind it The hotel is in a square and the economy rooms are on the inside so if you open the door every room can see straight in your room and the bed is right next to the door so very little privacy Anyone walking through the halls can also see in as they are open aswell At night they switch multicoloured lights on and there s no blackout curtain so your room turns into some sort of a rave at about 10 o clock as if it wasn t already hard enough to sleep
Positive_Review: Location was ok

Negative_Review: Cold stark outdated reception and bar area for a 4 star hotel Need a private comfortable lounge area for guests with good warm meet greet like the breakfast staff The breakfast staff were friendly but quiet low key They were organised helpful Tea coffee area in dining room needs more space or new location
Positive_Review: I was lucky had lvly quiet room comfortable bed Good location

Negative_Review: I left my ring on side locker on the sat night with the rest of my jewelery We went out early Sunday to visit the new camp On return that evening room was cleaned and my ring was no where to be seen I did say it to the man behind desk when leaving mon Because I wanted to go through all my luggage first just in case before excusing any body
Positive_Review: Staff at reception where over helpful With my stay even helped me find a room away from lift because I have a sleeping problem the staff where every nice with helping with bags and to make sure that we where looked after 100

Negative_Review: The hotel is very basic no coffee of tea facilities in your room Very noisey as the rooms doors are not sound proof So you hear everyone coming and going The breakfast was awful
Positive_Review: This hostel is placed in a great location but unfortunately it s about all it has going for it

Negative_Review: Overlooking La Rambla The windows are not double glazed and do not close properly and the noise at night is terrible hard to sleep The sink in our bathroom was cracked I also didn t like the steps down from the bathroom to the living room I fell down them at night and hurt myself breaking my toe
Positive_Review: The room was fabulous and spacious Beautiful stylish with a lovely bathroom couches a piano With views of La Rambla which is also a negative

Negative_Review: No facilities in room to make own drink when we got coffee tea in room service the housekeeper did not take dirty cups away when they cleaned room
Positive_Review: Helpful staff

Negative_Review: It is a very old property The bath room fittings are unique
Positive_Review: Location is the only thing that I liked about this hotel Mr Javier at the Reception was a good guy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Helpful staff Practical and comfortable room Particular praise for good bathroom lighting correctly positioned mirrors and a full length mirror Perfect location for doing that Barcelona thing swinging down La Rambla and strolling the twisty streets little sunny plazas and people watching at a shady cafe

Negative_Review: The bathroom produce pungent odor most probably from a bad sewerage system which also sometimes seeps around the room Mini bar is all charge even for mineral water I ask for queen bed but was given two single bed put together
Positive_Review: The location is excellent Very close to the luxury shopping district near aerobus metro stations and quite a number of halal restaurants around A walking distance to tariq ibn ziyad masjid

Negative_Review: Poor quality of the room for the price paid booked a suite with a Rambla view the wash hand basin had a large crack in it the wardrobe door didn t close correctly the TV in the bedroom didn t work properly and although there was tea and coffee making facilities in the room teabags coffee sachets there was no milk went to the supermarket across the road for it The breakfast although it looked appetising did not taste the same Doesn t rate 4 stars to me I have stayed in better 3 star hotels in Barcelona
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Rooms a little small and one of our group had a glass walled bathroom
Positive_Review: Lovely staff really friendly The perfect location for a whistle stop tour as we could get everywhere we wanted in minutes Rooms were spotless Nice bar Would stay here again

Negative_Review: It would have been nice to have a kettle in the room to make a cup of instant coffee or tea
Positive_Review: Hotel was very comfortable and the location was perfect for us Staff was helpful and friendly food in the onsite restaurant was very good although it was a bit expensive relative to other meals we had in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Buffet breakfast no good for 4 star category hotel at all Staff needs to be courteous for sure at buffet breakfast they were trying to avoid eye contact and ignoring so we may not ask for something it was very obvious to us Check Inn problems but it was still manageable
Positive_Review: Location excellent Rooms size big and nice decor balcony with excellent rambla view

Negative_Review: There was a very nasty smell in our room but we were moved to another room immediately after we complained However the smell returned as strong in the new room within 24 hours of moving No amount of air freshener we bought got rid of the smell We booked a superior rooms but this smell spoilt everything for us
Positive_Review: Very central

Negative_Review: Pity you have to pay for using health suite facilities and there is no swimming pool
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a fantastic position La Rambla is a great street to wander up and down It is close to the hop on hop off bus and also where you catch the Aerobus to and from the airport very reasonable prices There are many lovely restaurants within walking distance You can also walk down to Port Vell which is lovely

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: They were able to arrange flamenco show even with short notice The location was great You can walk around the plaza and just chose you from chinese japanese tapas american cafe turkish

Negative_Review: Very noise the street side where our room was assigned And the bed was very uncomfortable a double bed made of two twins and it gave us the feeling that they would get split while sleep we request a change and there were not availability However the last night they moved us to a very good room and quieter side and we sleep very well
Positive_Review: The location to walk around however noisy

Negative_Review: the room was a little dark we asked the stuff whats the best way to get there and they weren t very helpful so we needed to look on the web
Positive_Review: The Breakfast was great The location is the best on the la ramblas near the catalunia squere and many other attractions you have the aerobus station 5 min walk so you can get there very cheap from airport and 2 metro stations near by the room is a little dark but it s ok because you can open the window and have light from the la ramblas in

Negative_Review: No coffee making facilities in room poor light in bathroom no early check in Plug sockets poorly designed for travel adaptors would barely fit
Positive_Review: Location was excellent room was a decent size mini bar small but reasonable priced

Negative_Review: I didn t like bed and Room itself Mattress of one bed are cured uncomfortable to sleep on My room no 121 room has no curtains lights of street come into room at night
Positive_Review: Location of hotel

Negative_Review: IN THE ROOM WE STAYED IN PART OF THE FLOOR WAS DANGEROUS NEAR THE BATH WE COVERED IT WITH A BATHMAT
Positive_Review: THE CLEANLINESS HOTEL SITUATION VERY PLEASANT STAFF PLENTY OF HOT WATER

Negative_Review: Better comfort in room chairs to rest and watch tv It was too hot in the room with nocontrol Noise insulation poor neighbours and metro
Positive_Review: Reception very good Restaurant Food very good supergood Service

Negative_Review: One of our rooms was facing the street on the 1st floor Fabulous scenes outside but noisy at night
Positive_Review: I emailed the staff 2 days before we flew out to ensure we had one of the more modern rooms They replied with in an hour and were more than happy to accommodate my needs

Negative_Review: Late check in at 15 30 Very early check out at 11 00 Poor breakfast Not very clean bathroom Very small room for 115 euros night Looks like 3 star hotel No free drinking water tooth brush shaving kit and etc No kittle tea or coffee set Very noisy from 9 00 to 17 00 construction works beside or maybe inside
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: the room they gave me was so small with no view at all and small window my friend s room was much bigger with large windows and nice view
Positive_Review: great location room are good and clean

Negative_Review: Shutting down the air conditioning Information for tours had to be requested in the reception having to wait on line for personnel to assist you
Positive_Review: Very good location

Negative_Review: initially put in 610 and found the bed had been heavily urinated in by the last occupant the maids missed this and made the bed up clean I only found out when I got in and got wet Staff didn t handle this situation well absolutely no apology during the whole time we were there We were then placed into a room over the kitchens which had a foul trap smell in the bathroom and was NOISY so no sleep Second day we complained and we were moved to 607
Positive_Review: 607 room was really nice and we had a clean bed

Negative_Review: Bathroom wasn t comfortable the bed was 2 signals no iron in any room and breakfast was poor
Positive_Review: Nice and clean hotel in good location The rooms are big

Negative_Review: Room was small but we knew that booking it Didn t know room had no real window Plus the venalition system was almost none existent
Positive_Review: Location and staff

Negative_Review: Price was high but I know it was right on La Ramblas Small elevators too tiny for us Chubby Americans plus we had a lot of luggage Noisy for some but we love the action so if you want quiet don t stay on La Ramlas Bed very firm
Positive_Review: Excellent location Art work was interesting Room clean small typical European hotel Bathroom nice features Staff nice and helpful but busy

Negative_Review: The personnel was nice enoug but the rooms would benefit from some upkeep The mattresses were very hard and sleeping is top prority for a hotel There was a leakage anove the ceiling in our bathroom
Positive_Review: We were well taken are of But our booked quiet room had not been registerd We could reset this however abd had a nice view to the back garden

Negative_Review: Nothing really Would have appreciated an iron and board in room and a hairdryer not in the bathroom
Positive_Review: We were only on a three day break and Staff were extremely helpfull with everything particularly places to eat drink and giving directions Fantastic location had a Rambla view

Negative_Review: All the rest the room is very old this is not a 4 hotel The money we paid was double to what this hotel is worth Foul smell in the bathroom constant noise back room with no view at all uncomfortable In addition to all this a cleaner walked in to our room at around 8 35 while we were sleeping
Positive_Review: The location

Negative_Review: no tea or coffee maker machine no computers to print tickets etc available carpets were not clean actually were old and dirty
Positive_Review: Excellent location in the middle of the city The staff were very helpful and friendly Room size was more than enough

Negative_Review: Would be nice to have coffee maker or kettle in the room I had a cold and wanted to during something warm at night to get a hot water had to dress up and go to the restaurant and it only open until 11 pm
Positive_Review: Location is perferct

Negative_Review: Bed was lumpy and rather uncomfortable The restaurant was not available at a time we wanted to use it Ate a meal elsewhere
Positive_Review: Great location Hospitable staff Concierge was very helpful in connecting us with a taxi to our cruise ship

Negative_Review: The internet service was poor one must use it in the hotel lobby the elevators were narrow poor service for dinner only one waiter and poir service in the hotel lobby cava was served hot
Positive_Review: The beds were confortable room on the 7th floor was very quiet despite the hotel s location on the Ramblas nice balcony facing the cathedral

Negative_Review: this is my 5th time at the Rivoli and probably the last No added value of being a frequent visitor and rooms that are getting smaller from visit to visit
Positive_Review: good location

Negative_Review: No window in our room only matt glass window to a staircase shaft no daylight at all Really didn t expect that from a four star hotel Expensive breakfast
Positive_Review: Excellent location good beds and good bathroom

Negative_Review: The front desk receptionist who assisted us when we checked in needs further training in customer service He was not welcoming To be fair the front desk staff who assisted us in our check out was very pleasant
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Foul smell in foyer especially near lifts consistently there each day
Positive_Review: Excellent location as a tourist Good value tasty dinner at Terrace Restaurant Front desk very helpful Beds comfortable excellent shower good towels

Negative_Review: The bathroom sink drain was not working well there was an old pipe odor coming out of the drain Also at odd intervals there was a loud thumping that came from the side walls of the room that startled
Positive_Review: The bed mattress pillows were very good

Negative_Review: Hotel smelled strange AC doesn t work the way thermostat shows which is confusing You have to put the door card in door slowly before it ll unlock Shower door and hinge was moldy
Positive_Review: Location was great if you want to stay on Las rambles Bed was comfortable They allowed us to check in early which was great Windows have shutters which keeps out noise

Negative_Review: We ate breakfast at Moka a restaurnat next door to the hotel because we felt the charge at the hotel was too expensive We could get a full breakfast that included juice and coffee for 9 Euro there I would recommend providing coffee making facilities and an iron in the room
Positive_Review: The location and staff were very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Very small elevators Had trouble with the shower leaking onto the bathroom floor
Positive_Review: Location was great on the La Rambla It is an easy walk to Placa Catalunya for the Aerobus tour buses It is also in walking distance to the La Boqueria the food market

Negative_Review: I had booked a double room with air conditioning The first night we were put up in a real small room with an old air conditioner which was not working efficiently When i complained i was told that that was the room i had chosen I told the person that maybe i had chosen the small double room but i was told it was an ac room I was uncomfortable because of the heat Though they sent a person promptly to repair it was not functioning and I had to spend a night there because there were no rooms available But the next day after i insisted that they shift me i told them i would write a review on trip advisor they shifted me to the same category of room but it was so different than the old room they put us up in the first night It was well furnished had ventilation was a little more roomy whereas the earlier room had one small window It made me wonder why we were put up in such a room Are they supposed to reserve the best rooms for foreigners Did they expect indians to take things lying down and accept any kind of room provided to them are we paying any less for the room Though the location is excellent the comfort is far more important and you have to give equal treatment to everyone Due to this discomfort i preponed my trip by a day
Positive_Review: nothing exceptional except the staff in the restaurant who were really courteous warm as also at the reception who were helpful in guiding us in the city

Negative_Review: Internet is very very very bad you need to reconnection every time and entering the username and password every time Noise from outside the street Very old furniture If you want to smoke you have to go outside the hotel
Positive_Review: Actually nothing Just the carrier bags and the location Near metro restaurants shopping centers

Negative_Review: No tea or coffee facilities in room lift very small I know it s a continental breakfast but would be nice to have a full English breakfast as an option but continental breakfast was very nice
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic staff very helpful security was good to have safe in room

Negative_Review: The crew was not the most nice people
Positive_Review: The hotel located in the central of the city This is the only good thing in that hotel For the price they charging you can find something better

Negative_Review: The location is fine for those wishing to indulge in the chaos that is the Ramblas Next time we will look for a more quiet district
Positive_Review: The hotel was very good and the hotel staff were helpful and friendly Our room was clean and spacious

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Prime location in the heart of the famous la RAMBLA The rooms size is good WiFi signal was not very good didn t try the breakfast since the room rate was already expensive

Negative_Review: 1 Aircondition very noisy og half the time out of work 2 Very small dark room 3 Very loudly
Positive_Review: 1 Breakfast not for a 4 star hotel 2 Fantastic helpful personal

Negative_Review: Never buy thru booking website by an offer like 40 percent discount 102 euro per night They said small room for 2 people But in reality bed was for one person Totally disappointment It does not deserve this money
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: We booked three rooms same type price However on check in we noticed one was VERY different to the other two Way below standard and utterly unacceptable for the price we paid Had we not seen the other rooms we would have been unhappy but accepted it I dont think that type of room is acceptable to give to someone In saying that the staff were VERY accommodating and nice about it they acknowledged the issue and upgraded us to an amazing suite on our second and final night they couldnt change us on the first night as they were fully booked and gave all three rooms breakfast on the house for the second night Very good customer service and made a bad situation better
Positive_Review: On Las Ramblas lots of shops restaurants markets around the area walking distance Main station a few minute walk away with the hop on hop off starting point located there as well Staff very friendly accommodating Breakfast was good good service and a relatively good selection Reception staff especially the manager David were very helpful and went the extra mile to assist us with queries about the area and issues that we had Just a note NO shops are opened on a Sunday so don t leave any shopping for Sunday

Negative_Review: My son and I were quite satisfied all in all We used the room only to sleep and the beds are quite comfy
Positive_Review: Location and the 2 female staff were so helpful and pleasant Sorry I didn t get their names especially the lady who speaks excellent English

Negative_Review: Although in the center it was quite noisy late night and early morning The breakfast was not to our liking The hotel lobby smelled like fish
Positive_Review: the hotel was located in the center of everything

Negative_Review: Very hot room Aircondition is so bad and not working good Left is very bad Room toilets is so bad and towel are very old The blackout cirtines does not hide sunshinelight perfectly Room size is so small No coffee or facilites in the room Very high room rate around 192Euro per night I could not stay all my reservation so i changed the hotel next day to Hotel Royal Ramblas infront of Hotel Serhs Rivoly Rambla with a less rate cost me 150Euro night I dont recommend Hotel Serhs Rivoly Hotel in Barcelona
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Can t find one
Positive_Review: I can t find one thing that I dislike about this hotel The location is perfect we can see the street of La Rambla right from our window The room is decorated beautifully and very clean It is only 5 mins or less walk from Pl Catalunya which is also where you can get your Aerobus to ride to the airport

Negative_Review: I wouldn t rate this as a 4 star hotel More like UK 3 star A little pricey It s an old building obviously but the room and communal areas were very clean
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated on La Rambla within a 5 minute walk to Placa Catalunya where the airport shuttle bus stops and the tour buses run from Fabulous location Easy walk to all of the sights we wanted to visit Staff all friendly and helpful even at 1am when our door key wouldn t let us in the room

Negative_Review: room comfort we asked for a stand to accommodate for our suitcases but this seemed to become an issue room beautifully decorated but not practical some more hooks would have helped
Positive_Review: location room size deco breakfast

Negative_Review: There was a blackout late at night staff could have handled the situation better It was too dark to locate my room after climbing several flights of stairs no assistance was offered no torch or matches were available I had to leave the hotel find a shop which sold a cigarette lighter to be able to locate my room the blackout was not the hotel s fault but assistance to guests could have been better handled
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Mosty I liked was they gave me a room that I had asked when I made a reservation comment It was on the silent part of the hotel Thanks for that And the best part is the location of the hotel You can walk to every side and also metro is really close

Negative_Review: Our first room was an inside facing room with NO light coming in from the frosted over window The light in the suite itself was inadequate and it was like a dungeon AWFUL and depressing Requested a move to a new room and this made a huge improvement to the situation
Positive_Review: After spending one night in a dark and dungeon like room we requested another room This second room had a balcony facing a quiet street lots of light coming into the suite and we really enjoyed having the balcony

Negative_Review: I liked everything and would return Will highly recommend
Positive_Review: It was a great stay we enjoyed being close to Ramblas Plaza principal Clean and comfortable accomodations

Negative_Review: For the price it was a taxi fare away from the main attractions which made it a bit expensive
Positive_Review: We had an upgrade to a great room with lots of space and light

Negative_Review: Front desk receptionist was rude She did not give priority to people checking out especially those who needs to be at the airport earlier that day Instead was busy checking in 14 people even though rooms weren t available
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: Facilities not as described expected terrace bar there was a terrace but no facilities poor gym facilities need to be booked in advance Staff were very impersonal
Positive_Review: Central location

Negative_Review: There was a problem at checking out booking com made a mistake but it took good 40 mins to sort it all out as the staff kept saying that booking com never makes mistakes and kept insisting the problem is on our side
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I didn t like the stairs you had to go up in order to get to some of the rooms on any of the floors Also I took a cab from the airport to the hotel and the cab driver said it would be approximately 30 which it was during rush hour traffic then when I went to leave early am with NO traffic it was suddenly 40 The bellhop at the hotel I believe was in cahoots with the cab driver
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location is fantastic The staff is very friendly Even though the room was straight above the Ramblas we slept soundly thanks to the soundproof sliding doors

Negative_Review: Power went out twice for hours internet slow and intermittent no tea or kettle in room Separate doonas and sheets for a couple
Positive_Review: Great room over looking la rambla Comfy beds Shower pressure Excellent location Friendly staff

Negative_Review: Couldn t hire a kettle Poor view from superior room I have had a view of La Rambla from a standard room It hs become pricey over the years
Positive_Review: Stayed here since 1996 Wonderful for it s location alone Very clean Very friendly and helpful staff

Negative_Review: Nothing at all
Positive_Review: We had a super friendly welcome from Annette who also upgraded us to a lovely suite on the top floor with an amazing balcony Could not have asked for a better stay

Negative_Review: They could have a person on the terrace at the top of the building who serves drinks nibbles as you watch the sun go down It would be popular We went up there but no one else was using it
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed Great location Very helpful reception staff especially in the afternoon Lovely deck on top of building

Negative_Review: Bathrooms need a really good clean the black tiles didn t help but it all felt a little grubby
Positive_Review: Good location good size room and liked the small balcony Staff were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The room was a little on the small side but we didn t spend much time in the room so not that big of a deal
Positive_Review: The staff was very nice and accommodating and the hotel was very clean and in a great location

Negative_Review: Room was so small Admittedly stayed in the small double but definitely not that comfortable for 2 people also a completely glass bathroom so could see in at everything
Positive_Review: Superb location right on the rambla

Negative_Review: Breakfast didn t start until 7 which made it rushed when we were departing for the airport
Positive_Review: Great location room was large not sure if it was upgraded but it was very spacious

Negative_Review: Room sometimes noisy e g banging doors and dull internal decor
Positive_Review: The location was excellent Some of the staff particularly Carlos at the front desk were very helpful

Negative_Review: 1 The hotel is old It needs to renew specially the WC 2 The walls are very thin and the window isn t isolated well So I couldn t sleep after 9am because of annoying voices comes from the corridor and the La Rambla street 3 The rooms are very narrow and small We couldn t even opened two bags together 4 The room isn t deserve the cost 5 The Lifts are narrow and need maintenance
Positive_Review: Great location Good stuff

Negative_Review: When I placed the reservation I made sure to state that the booking was ON CONDITION that we were allocated a room with a proper double bed and NOT two single beds pushed together On arrival we had two single beds pushed together They were even made up with bedding for two single beds THIS WAS NOT WHAT WE HAD ORDERED PAID FOR We asked to be reallocated a room as requested and receptionist was VERY unhelpful saying they were unable to do so I asked for the bed beds to be made up with linen for a double bed so that we could use it as a double to be told that there were no housekeeping staff available I insisted that linen was brought to our room and I had to make it up myself Also the advertised roof terrace was not open when we tried to visit it
Positive_Review: Location on the Rambla was excellent

Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like was that we didn t stay longer than we did
Positive_Review: Hotel was absolutely stunning Staff were extremely helpful and the rooms were absolutely spotless Location was excellent

Negative_Review: Staff was extremely unhelpful and unfriendly While our room was renovated they put us on the first floor overlooking construction It was noisy from 7am and when we asked to change they said they had no availability even though online it said they had options We ended up changing hotels
Positive_Review: Great location Good price we booked at a discount

Negative_Review: Can think of anything
Positive_Review: Smoking off of the balcony Large bathroom Sitting area with desk Nice large room Just outside the hotel is the Ramblas the sight seeing bus stop is close by The staff was excellent

Negative_Review: The lift is sooo small
Positive_Review: I and my husband and my daughter stayed at the hotel from 30 March to 6 April 2016 when we arrived at night we have shocked when we see our room because it was very small and not suitable for us as a family with many luggage but the next day we talked to Mr Carlos Nogueira who is very cooperative smart and friendly he has changed our room to another one that was more comfortable and overlooking the street the location of the hotel is more than perfect you are in the middle of Ramblas street the most famous street in Barcelona and all the staff of the hotel are kind and friendly The only disadvantages is the Internet connection it was bad and disconnected a lot and the lift is very small

Negative_Review: Air conditioning was set only to provide heat and that too at night only If it gets warm I was told to open the Window As it was the first week in April we found that the room did get warm from the afternoon onwards Breakfast was not worth the 15 Euro So after the first morning we went ro a nearby place which served a good breakfast at half the cost Eventhough I booked more than two weeks in advance my Comfort Room at the back had a window which opened on to a wall They told me that the hotel was full and also that the front Rooms would be noisy from the Street Although both the Rooms were generally clean there was dust in corners and at edges of the room Bathroom door would not close properly as the door had sprung Restaurant did not have an attractive Menu
Positive_Review: Location was right at Las Ramblas which was excellent Many places to eat close by Very close to Placa Catalunya Reception Staff were friendly and courteous After two nights in a Room at the back with little light on request they transferred us to a Room facing Las Ramblas for the remaining two nights This was good and there was not much noise from the street up on our fourth floor front Room

Negative_Review: old hotel Not clean We book one double bad and recive two singles I complain and the unswerer was that this is a city hotel and there is huge demands for singles bads
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: I did not like that my windows were in front the wall I could not even se was it raining or not I did not take breakfast as I noticed that there were not fresh provisions but in packages
Positive_Review: I liked nice spatial room with very nice bathroom

Negative_Review: not worth 5 stars air con didn t work 30 degrees inside the room the only solution found by the conciergerie is to open both the door and window to have some air extremely noisy you can hear door slamming all day long and early in the morning Extremely unpolite reception worker no greetings not helpful the only positive fact about the hotel is its location a few steps from the boqueria
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The standard room we were in Room 608 was right next to the main atrium and it rained the night we stayed there so it was the noisiest room and we didnt sleep that night at all Also we didnt realise there was an electrically operated blind next to the bed so we slept with the curtain open all night and it was bright in our room overnight Finally and this is Booking com s fault the room rate said breakfast was included but actually it wasnt so we turned up for breakfast which looked lovely and we couldnt have it unless we paid extra
Positive_Review: Bed was comfortable in the upgraded room Clean modern and a great shower

Negative_Review: The wi fi could ve been more consistent The rumbling of the metro below the hotel obviously couldn t help that perhaps a room higher up would ve reduced the rumbling
Positive_Review: Location was just brilliant Bed was one of the most comfortable we ve slept in in a hotel The room 23 was massive but perfect temperature excellent view over Las Ramblas The closing partition doors to the seating area by the windows reduced notice levels

Negative_Review: Small details A metallic shampoo holder in the shower had rust on it It was unfortunate as everything else in the room was tip top Door to toilet was see through glass not the best choice of material

Negative_Review: We would have loved tea and coffee making facilities in our room which is standard in all English hotels and we were a little dissapointed we had to pay to use the sauna jacuzzi as this is also free with all hotel stays in the uk
Positive_Review: The staff and the room were fantastic we were very happy and they even upgraded us to the superior room Fantastic service
